title: Fantasy Premier League live Q&A: Gameweek Two advice from Ben Dinnery
description: It’s time to dust off your Gameweek One mishaps and get your FPL team in working order for the next set of Premier League fixtures
content:
We go again.

It’s time to dust off your Gameweek One mishaps and get your FPL team in working order for the next set of Premier League fixtures (deadline 6.30pm UK time/1.30pm ET).

Whether you are looking to avoid any rotational risks or are agonising over some last-minute gamechangers, Ben Dinnery of premierinjuries.com will be on hand today to talk you through the players to target, who to avoid, and the injury doubts you need to be aware of to give you the best chance of getting back on track.

Send your questions below, and Ben will be online to offer his expert insight from 1pm-2pm UK time (8am-9am ET).

Want to compete against your fellow subscribers? Join The Athletic FC mini-league with the code 30j0f7. You’ll also be able to test your mettle against Phil Hay, the lead writer of The Athletic FC newsletter. Click here to sign up to receive it directly to your inbox.
summary: Fantasy Premier League player Ben Dinnery will be available for a live Q&A to answer questions about how to prepare for the next Premier League fixtures. He will discuss the players to be targeted, who to avoid, and who to address injury concerns. The QA will be live from 1pm-2pm UK time (8am-9am ET) on Monday.
shortSummary: Ben Dinnery offers expert advice on improving your Fantasy Premier League team, highlighting key player targets and injury concerns ahead of the deadline.
argos_summary: As the Premier League fixtures approach, FPL players are encouraged to reassess their teams following Gameweek One. Ben Dinnery from premierinjuries.com will provide insights on player selection, injury updates, and strategies to improve performance during a live Q&A session. Additionally, readers can join The Athletic FC mini-league to compete with other subscribers.
